Title: Authorizes the town of Babylon to establish an administrative adjudication hearing procedure for code and ordinance violations
Summary: Authorizes the town of Babylon to establish an administrative adjudication hearing procedure for code and ordinance violations relating to conditions which constitute a threat or danger to the public health, safety or welfare.
LawCode: Amd ยง380, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the town of Babylon establishing an administrative adjudication hearing procedure for code and ordinance violations
